channel.title: CVE Feed for LINE MUSIC CORPORATION -- LINE MUSIC for Android
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LINE MUSIC CORPORATION -- LINE MUSIC for Android

item.title: CVE-2018-0650|2024-08-05T03:35:48.545Z -- line%20music%20corporation -- line%20music%20for%20android
item.description: The LINE MUSIC for Android version 3.1.0 to versions prior to 3.6.5 does not verify X.509 certificates from SSL servers, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.
